description:
Lyra is a Pok√©mon trainer from the Johto region who first met Ash and his friends just after they resuced her Marill. Her Marill was stuck between two buildings and Ash`s Pikachu and Dawn`s Piplup rescued it just as Kotone arrived.
Lyra was hosting a Johto Festa and invited Ash and his friends to check it out. After Team Rocket was defeated after trying to crash the Festa and steal Dawn`s egg, Lyra asked if she could travel with Ash.
name: Kotone
